name: LocusQ Emitter Passthrough
description: Validates that Emitter mode passes audio through unchanged (signal present, no NaN/Inf, no clipping). Tests Phase 2.1 emitter audio routing.

signal_present.description: Emitter must pass audio through — output cannot be silence

no_nan_inf.description: Output must not contain NaN or Inf samples

no_clipping.description: Emitter output should not clip with nominal input

rms_level.description: Output level should be close to input level (0 dB gain)

use_cases: Verify emitter audio passthrough is intact
Catch accidental silence or level changes
Confirm SceneGraph audio buffer pointer registration works
example_failures: signal_present=false → processBlock cleared the buffer in Emitter mode
non_finite → NaN propagated through emitter processing
clipping → gain applied incorrectly in emitter mode
